name: FPS Game (TrustedJoy)
description:
NOTE: THIS IS CURRENTLY A WORK IN PROGRESS (W.I.P) GAME AND IS LARGELY UNFINISHED

A FPS Game made with the Complete C# Unity Game Developer 3D Course on Udemy by GameDev.tv.

Controls:
W: Forward
S: Backward
A: Left
D: Right
Left Mouse Button: Shoot
Right Mouse Button: Zoom
Shift: Sprint
Space: Jump
Mouse Movement: Look around

FEATURE AVAILABLE

  • Movement
  • Shooting and Zooming
  • Basic Enemies
  • Health
  • Basic Sandbox Level

STUFF TO BE ADDED

  • Different Guns
  • Better Enemies
  • Good Levels
  • Ammo Pickups
  • Health Pickups
